jogo.dica1: This historical fiction action-adventure open world stealth video game series is well know for using replicas of famous historical places in it's level design
jogo.dica2: This game series features an ancient society of killers that operated in different cenarios such as the Italian Renaissance, Civil War United States or high-seas Pirates

jogo.nome: The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time

jogo.dica1: This is a Hack and Slash series that is exclusive to the Playstation consoles. The first game was released in 2005 for the PS2
jogo.dica2: Fight your way through many Greek legends and gods seeking revenge for your slayed family

jogo.dica1: This First-Person Shooter released in 2007 features a range of unique genetic abilities, named Plasmids, that include incinerating and freezing enemies
jogo.dica2: Encounter Big Daddies and Little Sisters in the underwater city of Rapture

jogo.dica1: This game was Mario's debut, although at the time his name was Jumpman
jogo.dica2: Universal Studios sued Nintendo because this game had many similarities with the movie King Kong

jogo.dica1: It's a famous Nintendo 64 Action/Platform game made by Rareware and released in 1998
jogo.dica2: A bear and a bird need to face against a wicked witch
